# [Nimbus EV ![](http://nimbusev.com/cdn/shop/files/Nimbus_logo_400x.png?v=1655904834)](http://www.nimbus.green/</>)

###  TRAVEL SMARTER, NOT HARDER 
Your 3-wheeled chariot awaits.
Rent for $200/monthBuy yours starting at $9,980Reserve yours today for $100
[Out of Stock](http://www.nimbus.green/</products/rent-your-nimbus-own-your-nimbus>)
### FEATURED IN
[![](http://nimbusev.com/cdn/shop/files/f60e5c840302882fcdba8b01f90ac880_362x.png?v=1655922730)](http://www.nimbus.green/<https:/www.autoevolution.com/news/nimbus-halo-is-a-three-wheel-ev-that-promises-the-world-at-an-affordable-price-157024.html>)[![](http://nimbusev.com/cdn/shop/files/5c9776fb7d80284257b3718231c113e_400x.png?v=1656076654)](http://www.nimbus.green/<https:/www.forbes.com/sites/bradtempleton/2022/04/21/tesla-teases-a-custom-robotaxi-are-they-crazy/?sh=727c84b15eb5>)[![](http://nimbusev.com/cdn/shop/files/9867b986f80f48f5ccb7c4d97e40eaea_400x.png?v=1655922730)](http://www.nimbus.green/<https:/insideevs.com/news/491442/nimbus-halo-best-three-worlds-electric-trike/>)[![](http://nimbusev.com/cdn/shop/files/42446e96cb4a10c88d7ac81588cd3737_400x.png?v=1655922730)](http://www.nimbus.green/<https:/www.rideapart.com/news/492990/nimbus-three-wheeler-electric-vehicle/>)[![](http://nimbusev.com/cdn/shop/files/0af792abf935fdac6a2bbb761df14e8c_400x.png?v=1655922730)](http://www.nimbus.green/<https:/techcrunch.com/2022/06/07/nimbus-launches-tiny-ev-prototype-thats-like-a-motorbike-with-a-roof/>)
GO 3x GREENER
THAN AN ELECTRIC CAR
In addition to an estimated 370MPGe in the city, the manufacturing of the Nimbus One uses fewer materials and batteries without compromising function or range.
SAFETY FIRST
FOR A WORRY-FREE RIDE
With front airbags, ABS, ADAS, and more, the Nimbus One offers the safety features of a car.
ACCELERATE YOUR ARRIVAL
WITHOUT THE HEFT OF A FULL-SIZED CAR
Go from 0-30mph in 3 seconds. With a body as narrow as a motorcycle, the Nimbus One makes it easier to navigate through traffic and faster to park.
GET MORE MILES
UP TO 93 MILES MAX IN RANGE
With a 9 kWh battery pack, top up the Nimbus One’s charge in 5.4 hours by plugging into a simple household outlet.
Previous Next
![](http://nimbusev.com/cdn/shop/files/16f1deb80709dcb2901039fe2f6c23_2800x.jpg?v=1656079504)![](http://nimbusev.com/cdn/shop/files/16f1deb80709dcb2901039fe2f6c23d8_1920x.png?v=1655928241)
###  IT’S COOL TO BE A THIRD WHEEL
We didn’t reinvent the wheel, we just added a third one. With similar safety features to a car and the nimble conveniences of a bike, the Nimbus One offers an Earth-friendly electric-charging solution—all under one sleek roof.
![](http://nimbusev.com/cdn/shop/files/DSC07775-Edit_1_1_1000x.jpg?v=1661875162)
###  THE NIMBUS DIFFERENCE: (BESIDES THE 3 WHEELS)
#### STATE-OF-THE-ART STABILITY
In addition to the standard driver’s airbag and a high-strength steel frame, the Nimbus One has onboard cameras and AI for added collision prevention. Its proprietary vehicle stability technology makes getting around more enjoyable than ever.
#### OUR PRICE
At just $200 a month to rent, or $9,980 to buy, the Nimbus One costs less than the cumulative costs of gas and insurance of a car.
![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0646/3887/7934/files/BE-NIMBLE-BE-QUICK.jpg?v=1656009710)
### BE NIMBLE, BE QUICK
Going from 0-30 mph in 3 seconds, the Nimbus One accelerates faster than the comparable vehicles on the market. Plus, the Nimbus One’s streamlined design and three-wheeled stability ensures you can carry your must-haves when you’re on the run, without the parking hassles that take time away from fun.
![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0646/3887/7934/files/STATE-OF-THE-ART-STABILITY.jpg?v=1656009710)
### OUR COMMITMENTTO THE ENVIRONMENT
The Nimbus One is a fully electric vehicle, and is built with fewer production materials resulting in less pollution during manufacturing. Thus, the Nimbus One is greener at every stage.
> It’s a perfect urban vehicle that combines the convenience of micromobility with the safety of a car.
TechCrunch
[READ FULL REVIEW](http://www.nimbus.green/<https:/techcrunch.com/2022/06/07/nimbus-launches-tiny-ev-prototype-thats-like-a-motorbike-with-a-roof/?guccounter=1&guce_referrer=YW5kcm9pZC1hcHA6Ly9jb20uZ29vZ2xlLmFuZHJvaWQuZ20v&guce_referrer_sig=AQAAALEPBnY_F7Zz2bD1kSwC3XNIe3wiJo3KtMrKXnxYYzdVv5YJGF0_YU_7d_gxiRdXTAKI64LMgy-4itIczIMbTeLTRLqFJBuWN7zrOpu-kO7ppUFOZKgIA_85HTXwEbCj-a1iualfU4QSK8KvDBwOe9rGDuOjg8I4vi36AU3yily7>)
![](http://nimbusev.com/cdn/shop/files/0c49a99a40223e24c6070bbfd15225c5_1920x.png?v=1655930490)
###  MAKE ‘EM GO GREEN(WITH ENVY) 
Disrupt and drive. Get around on three wheels and lower your eco-impact. $100 guarantees you a Nimbus One, and then:Rent for $200 a month ORBuy your own starting at $9,980 
[Out of Stock](http://www.nimbus.green/</pages/buy-rent>)
### Nimbus Specs
Top Speed | Nimbus One - 50mph (80km/h)Nimbus One S - 75mph (121km/h)  
---|---  
Acceleration | Nimbus One - 0-30mph (48km/h) in 3sNimbus One S - 0-30mph (48km/h) in 2.8s  
Efficiency | 370MPGe city  
Structure | High-strength steel with thermoplastic shell  
Curb Weight | 727.5 lbs (330kg)  
Range | Nimbus One - 93 miles (150km) cityNimbus One S - 128 miles (206km) city  
Length | 91" (2.3m)  
Width | 34" (0.86m)  
Seating | 1+1  
Battery | Nimbus One - 9 kWh (swappable)Nimbus One S - 12 kWh (fixed)  
Charge Time (0-95%) | Under 5.5 hours from a standard household plug  
Infotainment | Bluetooth speakers  
Airbags | Front airbag  
Traction | ABS and traction control  
Vehicle intelligence | Nimbus Balance, Frontal Collision Warning, additional features will be added with OTA updates  
Max Grade | 45% slope  
Climate Control | Heating, optional A/C  
Shoulder Room | 28.5" (725mm)  
Head Room | 38.6" (980mm)

generated_description:
**Nimbus: The Future of Urban Mobility**

Founded in 2018 and hailing from Ann Arbor, Michigan, Nimbus is carving out its niche in the world of urban transportation. Picture a company that aspires to be the "Tesla for city dwellers." It aims to revolutionize city commuting with its innovative three-wheeled electric vehicle, the Nimbus One.

As a proud member of Y Combinator's W20 batch, Nimbus is small but mighty, operating with a dedicated team of just five employees. They're tackling mobility challenges head-on, embodying the shift toward sustainable transport while keeping affordability in mind. Their motto? "Travel smarter, not harder."

**The Nimbus One: Innovation at Its Core**

The Nimbus One is not just an electric vehicle—it's a statement. Engineered for city living, this three-wheeler offers the agility of a motorcycle with the safety features of a car, all without the bulky stature of a conventional vehicle. You can rent one for $200 a month or buy it outright for $9,980. Plus, for early enthusiasts, a $100 reservation secures your Nimbus One.

If you’re wondering about the specs, here’s a quick rundown:
- **Speed**: Accelerates from 0 to 30 mph in just 3 seconds.
- **Efficiency**: Boasts a staggering 370 MPGe in city driving.
- **Range**: Up to 93 miles on a single charge with a 9 kWh battery.
- **Safety Features**: Includes front airbags, anti-lock brakes, advanced driver-assistance systems, and proprietary stability technology to enhance your ride.

**Eco-Friendly Commitment**

Nimbus's commitment to the environment is evident. The Nimbus One is designed to be three times greener than a typical electric car, thanks to its lower material consumption without skimping on function or range. The ethos here is clear: create an electric vehicle that reduces the carbon footprint at every possible stage.

**A Unique Proposition for Urban Living**

In a world crowded with oversized cars and environmental concerns, Nimbus offers a compelling alternative. Imagine zipping through tight city streets, seamlessly maneuvering where others can't. This vehicle not only promises convenience but also positions itself as a responsible choice for urban transportation.

Curious about Nimbus? Check out their website at [Nimbus.green](http://www.nimbus.green) for more insights, pre-orders, and updates. Whether you're a city dweller seeking smarter transportation or an eco-conscious consumer, Nimbus is geared to transform how you think about getting around. 

In the words of TechCrunch, "It’s a perfect urban vehicle that combines the convenience of micromobility with the safety of a car." With Nimbus, the wheel has indeed been reimagined—this time with a third one for added stability and style.
